vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerability in singleCrunch function leads to arbitrary code execution via filePath parameters
vulnerabilities.description: aaptjs is a node wraper for aapt. An issue was discovered in the singleCrunch function in shenzhim aaptjs 1.3.1, allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via the filePath parameters.
